pyepo.func.spoplus.solveWithObj4Par(cost, args, model_type)¶

A global function to solve function in parallel processors

Parameters

  • cost (np.ndarray) – cost of objective function

  • args (dict) – optModel args

  • model_type (ABCMeta) – optModel class type

Returns

optimal solution (list) and objective value (float)

Return type

class pyepo.func.spoplus.SPOPlus(optmodel, processes=1, solve_ratio=1, dataset=None)¶

Bases: torch.autograd.Function

A autograd function for SPO+ Loss, as a surrogate loss function of SPO Loss, which measures the decision error of optimization problem.

For SPO/SPO+ Loss, the objective function is linear and constraints are known and fixed, but the cost vector need to be predicted from contextual data.

The SPO+ Loss is convex with subgradient. Thus, allows us to design an algorithm based on stochastic gradient descent.

static forward(ctx, pred_cost, true_cost, true_sol, true_obj)¶

Forward pass in neural network

Parameters

  • pred_cost (torch.tensor) – a batch of predicted values of the cost

  • true_cost (torch.tensor) – a batch of true values of the cost

  • true_sol (torch.tensor) – a batch of true optimal solutions

  • true_obj (torch.tensor) – a batch of true optimal objective values

Returns

SPO+ loss

Return type

torch.tensor
